# Data Overview

There are mainly seven tables among which Application (train and test) is the master table. The entities of these dataset are deidentified (replaced with ID) for security reasons. The application table contains records for each loan application with Home Credit. Other tables contain records of clientsâ€™ previous loan application with Home credit, other credits which are reported to credit bureau and instalment payment records.
